selectCID.Des: Des是說明：method為selectCID，sql為要查詢的sql語句，input為要輸入的參數與sql型別

dropdownBar.sql: select C.CName from Class P, Class C, Inheritance I where P.CName = @cName and I.PCID = P.CID and I.CCID = C.CID

getRes.sql: select O.resName, O.addr, O.meal, O.cuisine, O.stayTime from Class C, CO , object O where C.CName = @cName and CO.CID = C.CID and CO.OID = O.OID
